statements: SELECT * FROM lookalike_audience WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, gender FROM lookalike_audience WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM lookalike_audience ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, location FROM lookalike_audience WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, age, interests FROM lookalike_audience WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM lookalike_audience WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM lookalike_audience WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT user_id, interests FROM lookalike_audience WHERE interests LIKE '%music%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM lookalike_audience WHERE location = 'New York' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age, user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, location FROM lookalike_audience WHERE age <= 30 AND location IN ('Los Angeles', 'Chicago') ORDER BY user_id ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM lookalike_audience;
SELECT user_id, age, gender, interests FROM lookalike_audience WHERE age >= 25;
SELECT user_id, gender FROM lookalike_audience WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, interests FROM lookalike_audience WHERE interests LIKE '%sports%';
SELECT * FROM potential_customers WHERE location = 'New York' AND age_range = '25-35';

SELECT customer_id, location, age_range FROM potential_customers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM lookalike_audience JOIN potential_customers ON lookalike_audience.interests = potential_customers.interests;
SELECT user_id, gender, interests FROM lookalike_audience INNER JOIN potential_customers ON lookalike_audience.age = potential_customers.age_range;
